title: Nanoparticles incorporated hydrogels for delivery of antimicrobial agents: developments and trends
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13535-13564
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00631C, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Naveed Ahmad, Syed Nasir Abbas Bukhari, Muhammad Ajaz Hussain, Hasan Ejaz, Muhammad Usman Munir, Muhammad Wahab Amjad
Nanoparticle-hydrogel systems are versatile biomaterials that possess numerous advantages for biomedical applications. This review focuses on the application of the nanoparticle-hydrogels system for the delivery of antimicrobial agents.
